item.title: [317]delta based, not getting exp for killing npc that i made give exp. look
item.dc:creator: @owner_of_epic_scape owner of epic scape
item.description:
@owner_of_epic_scape wrote:

well i added npcs in slayer tower, for when you kill them you get exp, here is the code its still not giving exp.if (npcs[i].npcType == 1648) { temp.addSkillXP(500, 18); } if (npcs[i].npcType == 90) { temp.addSkillXP(750, 18); } if (npcs[i].npcType == 1616) { temp.addSkillXP(3000, 18); } if (npcs[i].npcType == 1637) { temp.addSkillXP(5000, 18); } if (npcs[i].npcType == 1643) { temp.addSkillXP(4000, 18); } if (npcs[i].npcType == 1624) { temp.addSkillXP(8000, 18); } if (npcs[i].npcType == 1610) { temp.addSkillXP(9000, 18); } if (npcs[i].npcType == 1613) { temp.addSkillXP(10000, 18); } if (npcs[i].npcType == 1615) { temp.addSkillXP(15000, 18); } if (npcs[i].npcType == 2783) { temp.addSkillXP(17500, 18); }
